body.raw:
{
    "ims_domain": "IMS Domain",
    "enable_homer_pcscf": false,
    "enable_homer_scscf": true,
    "enable_homer_icscf": true,
    "enable_ipsec": true,
    "encryption_algorithm_aes": true,
    "encryption_algorithm_des": true,
    "encryption_algorithm_plain": false,
    "enable_tls": true,
    "pcscf_shared_memory": 4096,
    "pcscf_private_memory": 40,
     "pcrf_ip": "192.168.2.16" ,
    "pcrf_fqdn": "https://www.google.com/search?q=fqdn",
    "pcrf_realm": "folan",
    "transport_protocol": "TCP",
    "enable_rx_source_port": true,
    "rx_source_port": 3095,
    "icscf_shared_memory": 4096,
    "icscf_private_memory": 32,
    "minimum_register_time": 200,
    "maximum_register_time": 2000,
    "scscf_shared_memory": 4096,
    "scscf_private_memory": 32,
    "supported_hd_codes_g722": false,
    "supported_hd_codes_amr_wb": true,
    "enable_srtp": true,
    "inbound_port_minimum": 20000,
    "inbound_port_maximum": 39999,
    "outbound_port_minimum": 40000,
    "outbound_port_maximum": 59999,
    "enable_call_duration": true,
    "call_duration": 3600,
    "rtp_proxy_loss_timeout": 60
    
}
